snippet: The news channel, which replaced Current TV on Tuesday, lost some viewers when it was dropped by AT&T U-verse and could not be streamed over the Internet.
abstract: Al Jazeera America, which replaced Current TV and promises serious, straightforward news, is dropped by AT&T U-verse; channel was expected to be carried by five of country's biggest television providers; broadcaster asserts breaches of contract and promises legal action to enforce agreement.
lead_paragraph: The news channel, which replaced Current TV on Tuesday, lost some viewers when it was dropped by AT&T U-verse and could not be streamed over the Internet.

headline.main: Al Jazeera Makes Limited American Debut
headline.print_headline: Hiccup for Debut of Al Jazeera America
